## ë¦¬í…ì…˜ ë¶„ì„

**ì£¼ìš” ì»¬ëŸ¼ ì„¤ëª…**:

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT 
    monthly_active_users
FROM theshop_brand_mau_summary
WHERE service_name = 'theshop-brand'
    AND CAST(year_month || '-01' AS DATE) >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1' month)
    AND execution_date = (SELECT MAX(execution_date) FROM theshop_brand_mau_summary)
ORDER BY year_month DESC
LIMIT 1

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT 
    overall_conversion_rate as conversion_rate
FROM theshop_brand_conversion_summary
WHERE service_name = 'theshop-brand'
    AND execution_date = (SELECT MAX(execution_date) FROM theshop_brand_conversion_summary)

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT 
    daily_active_users
FROM theshop_brand_dau_summary
WHERE service_name = 'theshop-brand'
    AND date = CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1' DAY
    AND execution_date = (SELECT MAX(execution_date) FROM theshop_brand_dau_summary)
LIMIT 1

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT 
    calculation_date AS time,
    overall_conversion_rate as conversion_rate
FROM theshop_brand_conversion_summary
WHERE service_name = 'theshop-brand'
    AND calculation_date >= current_date - interval '30' day
    AND execution_date = (SELECT MAX(execution_date) FROM theshop_brand_conversion_summary)
ORDER BY calculation_date

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT 
    date AS time,
    daily_active_users
FROM theshop_brand_dau_summary
WHERE service_name = 'theshop-brand'
    AND date >= current_date - interval '30' day
    AND execution_date = (SELECT MAX(execution_date) FROM theshop_brand_dau_summary)
ORDER BY date

SELECT 
    CAST(year_month || '-01' AS DATE) AS time,
    monthly_active_users
FROM theshop_brand_mau_summary
WHERE service_name = 'theshop-brand'
    AND CAST(year_month || '-01' AS DATE) >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '12' month)
    AND execution_date = (SELECT MAX(execution_date) FROM theshop_brand_mau_summary)
ORDER BY year_month

targets.rawSQL:
WITH LatestRetention AS (
    SELECT 
        service_name,
        retention_type,
        base_users,
        retained_users,
        retention_rate,
        calculation_date,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY retention_type ORDER BY calculation_date DESC) as rn
    FROM theshop_brand_retention_summary
    WHERE service_name = 'theshop-brand'
        AND retention_rate IS NOT NULL
        AND execution_date = (SELECT MAX(execution_date) FROM theshop_brand_retention_summary)
)
SELECT
    retention_type,
    base_users,
    retained_users,
    retention_rate,
    calculation_date
FROM LatestRetention
WHERE rn = 1
ORDER BY 
    CASE retention_type
        WHEN 'D+1' THEN 1
        WHEN 'D+7' THEN 2
        WHEN 'D+30' THEN 3
    END

panels.title: ì¬ë°©ë¬¸ìœ¨ (ë¦¬í…ì…˜)

ì„¸ì…˜ ì „í™˜ìœ¨ = (ì¥ë°”êµ¬ë‹ˆ ë‹´ê¸° ì„¸ì…˜ ìˆ˜ Ã· ì „ì²´ ì„¸ì…˜ ìˆ˜) Ã— 100

targets.rawSQL:
SELECT 
    calculation_date as date,
    total_sessions,
    product_view_sessions,
    cart_add_sessions,
    total_users,
    purchasing_users,
    overall_conversion_rate
FROM theshop_brand_conversion_summary
WHERE service_name = 'theshop-brand'
    AND calculation_date >= current_date - interval '30' day
    AND execution_date = (SELECT MAX(execution_date) FROM theshop_brand_conversion_summary)
ORDER BY calculation_date DESC
